thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: What You Need to Know About Europe’s Big New Mifid Rules

author: Max Colchester
title: What You Need to Know About Europe’s Big New Mifid Rules
text:
A massive set of finance regulations known as Mifid II, looming for years, comes into force on Wednesday. Here is what you need to know:
What is Mifid II? The Markets in Financial Instruments Directive II is a regulatory overhaul that reaches into just about every corner of how securities are traded in Europe.
The EU rules are nearly eight...
